prompts.generate10: Generate 10 multiple choice questions with 4 answer options each, including detailed explanations for correct answers
prompts.fromDocument: Create a comprehensive exam with multiple choice questions based on the key concepts from the uploaded document
prompts.quick5min: Generate a quick 5-minute quiz with 5 multiple choice questions that can be completed in 5 minutes
prompts.advanced: Create challenging advanced-level questions that test deep understanding and critical thinking skills
prompts.trueFalse: Generate 10 true/false questions with clear explanations for each correct answer
prompts.mixed: Create a mixed exam with multiple choice, true/false, and short answer questions covering various difficulty levels
prompts.comprehensive: Generate a comprehensive study test with 15-20 questions covering all major topics and concepts
prompts.exam: Create a final exam preparation test with 25 challenging questions suitable for assessment purposes
prompts.custom: Generate questions in a custom format - specify your preferred question types, difficulty level, and number of questions
prompts.beginner: Create beginner-friendly questions with simple language and fundamental concepts for introductory learning
prompts.multipleChoice: Generate multiple choice questions only with 4 answer options per question and clear explanations
prompts.practice: Create practice test questions for skill reinforcement with immediate feedback and explanations
prompts.revision: Generate revision quiz questions focusing on key concepts and important topics for review purposes
prompts.conceptual: Create questions that test conceptual understanding rather than memorization, focusing on 'why' and 'how'
prompts.essay: Generate short answer and essay questions that require detailed explanations and critical analysis
